description: OSDUpdate is a tool designed for managing the deployment of updates for Microsoft Office and other applications. It facilitates the retrieval of all applicable updates since 2015, making it ideal for preparing refreshed or newly imaged devices with the latest patches. Users can leverage both OSDUpdate and PowerShell scripts to effectively pull updates and automate installation processes. The tool simplifies the repackaging of Office 2016 to ensure new systems are fully equipped with all necessary updates and patches. With documentation available online, OSDUpdate provides a reliable resource for system administrators tasked with maintaining updated environments.
